info.name: shortest Menger (98 chars)
info.description: NB: apparently firefox/windows/angle  has a bug when compiling O.a++

renderpass.code:
#define mainImage(O,u)                    \
    for ( vec2 U = u / iResolution.y, I;  \
          O.a++ < 6.;                     \
          I == I/I || I.x > 2. ? O++ : O  \
        ) U -= I = floor(U *= 3.)
        
        
        
/** 114 chars

#define mainImage(O,u)              \
    vec2 U = u / iResolution.y, I;  \
    U.x > 1. ? O++ : O;             \
    for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++ )    \
        U -= I = floor(U *= 3.),    \
        I==vec2(1) ? O++ : O

/**/
renderpass.name: Image
